DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety immunogenicity GSK Biologicals ' live attenuate MMR vaccine ( Priorix ) local population Singapore . The vaccine administer single dose healthy child ( 12-18 month age ) blood sample collect two time point ( vaccination vaccination ) .
DOC.brief_title: Assess GSK Biologicals ' MMR Vaccine ( Priorix ) When Given Healthy Children Age 12 18 Months Singapore .
DOC.criteria: A male female infant 12 18 month age time vaccination Written inform consent obtain parent guardian subject . Free obvious health problem establish medical history clinical examination enter study . Use investigational nonregistered drug vaccine study vaccine ( ) study period within 30 day precede dose study vaccine Previous vaccination mumps and/or rubella History , intercurrent , measles , mumps , and/or rubella disease Known exposure measles , mumps rubella within 30 day prior start study Any confirm suspected immunosuppressive immunodeficient condition , include human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection .
